root
children :
    GridTopology
    children :
        surnum : str = "GridTopology"
        ghost_type : str = "FACE"
    GridGeometry
    children :
        surnum : str = "网格参数"
        use_entity_global_id : bool = 1
        new_period : bool = 0
        period_mode : str = "old_period"
        periodicity_num : int = 1
        period_gap : real = 1.0e-05
        MeshImportationParameter
        children :
            surnum : str = "网格输入参数"
            file_name : str = "mesh.spmesh"
            refine_times : int = 0
        periodicity_1
        children :
            surnum : str = "周期边界条件_1"
            periodic_type : int = 2
            translation_vector : real list = [0.0, 0.0, 1.0]
            rotation_invariant_point : real list = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
            rotation_axis_direction : real list = [0.0, 0.0, 1.0]
            rotation_angle : real = 60.0
            periodic_set_id : int list = [0, 1]
            periodic_set_id_1 : int = 1
            periodic_set_id_2 : int = 2
            part_id : int = 1
